Package uk.ac.rhul.cs2800

Class Entry

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.rhul.cs2800.Entry
public class Entry
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines what the type of entry a value is that has been entered into the calculator
Author:
Kevin

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getString()
    Gets the string version of the symbol so the enum can be printed.
    Symbol getSymbol()
    Finds the symbolic value of the entry object.
    Type getType()
    Gets the type of entry that has been constructed (Number, String, Symbol, Invalid).
    float getValue()
    Finds the value for the numeric entry object.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getValue

      public float getValue() throws BadTypeException
      Finds the value for the numeric entry object.
      Returns:
      the numeric value of a number entry
      Throws:
      BadTypeException - when the type is not a number.

    • getSymbol

      public Symbol getSymbol() throws BadTypeException
      Finds the symbolic value of the entry object.
      Returns:
      the symbol enum of which type of symbol the object is
      Throws:
      BadTypeException - when the type is not a symbol

    • getType

      public Type getType()
      Gets the type of entry that has been constructed (Number, String, Symbol, Invalid).
      Returns:
      the type of entry that has been entered into the calculator

    • getString

      public java.lang.String getString() throws BadTypeException
      Gets the string version of the symbol so the enum can be printed.
      Returns:
      the string associated with the specific Symbols enum
      Throws:
      BadTypeException - when type is not Symbol
